report.title: Chilled
report.author: KrazyGlue
report.bodytext: I have no drugs in my system as of now, unless you would consider catnip a drug. I have been clean for some time now, and I just tried smoking catnip for the first time. I feel remarkably at peace right now. It is not a high like marijuana but it is pleasant. I notice a marked reduction in my typing skills as I write this, but I can still think pretty clearly. This feels quite good really. I guess if you had recently been using marijuana it would probably not be so good, but I like it. The stuff smells remarkably like marijuana when it burns.
